page.title: 08UNEMPLOYMENT IN ARBROATH.
page.content: Arbroath has the highest level of{ {unemployment}in the entire Tayside region.Because of this the Pool centre for the unemployed was opened.It gives the unemployed{population}the chance to learn skills and enjoy{leisure} activities.The centre was opened in March 1984.Mr. I. Cameron,the manager, told us that there was Joinery and Woodwork,in the workshop,Metalwork, Sewing,Knitting,Art and Craft activities,Computing,Photography(they had a Dark room for developing)Cycle repair,Library and{recreation}.Soon there will be a Multi-Games Room and Mr. Cameron hopes to introduce a creche.Between 150 and 250 people use the centre each week.They would like to include music listening facilities and to expand the Library.At the moment the centre opens on weekdays from 9am to 5pm.
